package.name: waywiser_twist_safety
package.description: Package that manages twist commands to vehicle from different sources using twist_mux, nav2 collision monitoring, and emergency stop monitoring. The onboard_twist_mux node subscribes to topics configured in twist_safety_config file, e.g., teleop_mux_vel, waywise_vel etc., and publishes to "onboard_mux_vel" by multiplexing between sunscribed topics according to their priorities. Nav2 collision_monitor node performs several collision avoidance related tasks using incoming data from the sensors and prevents potential collisions by reducing the linear speed and even setting it to zero to stop the vehicle. Upon receiving a boolean 'true' data on the "/emergency_stop" topic, the emergency_stop_monitor node suspends its input twist commands and publishes a zero-velocity twist command on its output topic. When a boolean 'false' data is received on the "/emergency_stop" topic, the emergency stop is deactivated, allowing the commands to pass through from the input to the output twist topics.
